name: Alcoholics Anonymous Meetings
description: San Francisco and Marin Alcoholics Anonymous has meetings for people struggling with alcohol use to talk about their personal experience with alcohol. Meeting formats include: - Big Book Study - Speaker/Discussion - Step & Tradition - Meditation Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-674-1821 (24 Hours a day) - Email: help@aasfmarin.org
